com.sun.pdfview.font
Class PDFGlyph

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.pdfview.font.PDFGlyph

public class PDFGlyph
extends java.lang.Object

A single glyph in a stream of PDF text, which knows how to write itself onto a PDF command stream
